titleStmt.title: The Common-wealths catechism. Published to inform the good and plain people of this Common-wealth, in arms, and out of arms, and to prevent the designes of hypocritical ambition. Humbly dedicated to the members of Parliament, and their General Monck. / By Lyon Freeman.
titleStmt.author: Freeman, Lyon.

notesStmt.note: Not in fact a catechism, but a satire on Parliament in catechestical form. Author's name may be a pseudonym.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
